meanings.definition: To surpass or outdo in a game or competition.
meanings.sent1: In the race, Sarah overtrumps all her competitors with her speed.
meanings.sent2: John overtrumps everyone in chess; he always wins.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel overtrumps the other animals in the nut-gathering contest.
meanings.sent4: Her determination overtrumps any obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The sun overtrumps the moon in brightness during the day.

meanings.definition: To prevail over or defeat someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The superhero overtrumps the villain in the final battle.
meanings.sent2: The army overtrumps the enemy forces in the decisive battle.
meanings.sent3: The student overtrumps the tricky math problem with ease.
meanings.sent4: Love overtrumps hate in the end.
meanings.sent5: Kindness overtrumps anger in making friends.

meanings.sent1: Her bright smile overtrumps any cloudy day.
meanings.sent2: The new building overtrumps the old one with its modern design.
meanings.sent3: The colorful flowers overtrump the plain grass in the garden.
meanings.sent4: His talent overtrumps his lack of experience.
meanings.sent5: The star overtrumps all others in the night sky.
